section.name: Installing Magic
section.p: These instructions assume that you have already installed Depot and Ant (see the download page for details).

subsection.name: Installation Procedure
subsection.p: The following command will install magic resources under ${dpml.prefs}/magic and dependent jar files into ${dpml.lib}/dpml/magic. The install procedure will make copy of two jar file dpml-transit-main and dpml-transit-tools under ${user.home}/.ant/lib directory. Finally, the installation will create a Transit profile for use with Magic under the user branch of you JVM preferences with a node identifier of net/dpml/transit/profiles/development.
